title: (x) Bishop McGuinness - Schneidler Initials (Shango/Bauer Text Initials) {Chesh, Patricia}
content:
Hello All! Just wanted to say that this is one of the friendliest forums I have every visited. So I'm back again to ask for your expertise. What is this?   
   
 ![BM](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41609.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Brasil Portugal football - Akzidenz-Grotesk Cond {Joseph D}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5830 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Telia UnLtd. - Bliss {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27045 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nosh

comments.content: \<font \> - ehhh, i dont know where that came from?! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Arrgh, the server is acting up

It's Schneidler Initials, but I can't find anything other than [Shango](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/regular/testdrive.html?s=BISHOP%2BMcGUINESS&p=72), which Jason Castle explicitly says is a Schneidler digitization.
Looks to me like [Opti Bauer text initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=PF00001101P2&start=1) which I see is another version of Shango.

_\> \<font \> - ehhh, i dont know where that came from?!_   
  
The \<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\> code is Typophile   
reminding us it has been built on extremely whacky code.   
It appears when you edit a post, and the only way to get   
rid of it is to manually erase the code while you're editing.   
And don't forget the \</font\> at the end of your post. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

_\> Just wanted to say that this is one of the friendliest forums   
I have every visited._      
   
THX! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190117im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Off topic: Would you call that logo over-designed?

yeah, i would. - customers are crazy!   
   
Thanks Again Everyone.

yeah, i would. - customers are crazy!   
   
Thanks Again Everyone.
WOW! Please delete these... I wont do it again, I hope.
